title: Game sometimes freezes
body:
It's not often this happens, but every couple of months League will randomly freeze for a few seconds. While it's not a common issue, it can be very annoying when it happens sometimes causing deaths, or lost team fights, even lost GAMES. I get scared when it happens as I fear it will lead to a crash, but it never does.

Is this a game issue, or a computer issue?

replies.body: This might have something to do with your graphics drivers, as if they aren't updated to the latest software your graphics card might be having a hard time keeping up. Let's check for any driver updates you might have missed, but also be sure to go through the rest of the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well. Test those changes out in a custom game and let me know how it went!
No... they're up to date. Updating them to the latest driver made things worse as now my frame rate dips randomly & my monitor has this annoying flicker now.
